name: PET Snake
description: Here is the original Commodore CBM/PET version of Snake by Donkeysoft, on which PET Snake 64 is based. The archive contains a tape image for use with digital emulation, which can be transferred to run on real hardware with the correct PC and Apple Mac tools, though you will need some technical know-how to achieve this. Alternatively, break in to the program, add a blank disk image to your emulator and save the program listing to disk. There is no copy protection included here, unlike the Commodore 64 version. So this means you may also LIST the program to examine the source.
